document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalogue and bibliography of the taxonomy, synonymy and distribution of the Recent Vetigastropoda of South Africa (Mollusca)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalogue and bibliography of the taxonomy, synonymy and distribution of the Recent Vetigastropoda of South Africa (Mollusca)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Trochus multicolor
Krauss, 1848
: 97
, pl. 5 , fig. 31 .
Martens, 1874
: 129
, no. 97 . P. Fischer, 1878 in
1875–1880
: 316 , pl. 99 , fig. 3 . Type loc.: ‘
in sinu tabulari
’ [Table Bay]; type material probably lost, none in SMNH (
Herbert & Warén 1998
).

Stomatella biporcata
A. Adams, 1850
: 33
.
A. Adams, 1854 b
: 839
, pl. 175 , fig. 43 .
Tomlin, 1921 b
: 237
. Type loc.: ‘ in littoribus Australiae ’ [on the shores of Australia ] [Cuming], erroneous (
Tomlin, 1921 b
); three syntypes in NHM ( NHMUK 1994039 ).

Gibbula fucata
Gould, 1861
: 20
. G.B. Sowerby (III), 1894 : 372 . G.B. Sowerby (III), 1897 : 18 .
Bartsch, 1915
: 155
, pl. 27 , figs 4–6 . Type loc.: originally unknown, later given as ‘Cape of Good Hope’ (
Johnson 1964
); lectotype in USNM ( 2047 ), designated by
Johnson ( 1964 : 79 )
, figured by
Bartsch ( 1915 )
.

subSubSection.paragraph:

[ sic ]—G.B. Sowerby (III), 1889 b: 153 .

, pl. 50 , no. 1353 . Type loc.: Port Alfred, E. Cape; two syntypes in OXUM .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Not
Gibbula multicolor
—Steyn & Lussi, 1998 : 20 , fig. 52 a, b [= G. b e n z i (
Krauss, 1848
)].
Distribution. Southern Transkei (Coffee Bay) to Atlantic Cape (Saldanha Bay); living intertidal and shallow subtidal.
